Football (College)
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: David Wilson, who is 5 feet 9 inches and 206 pounds, is the first running back the Giants have selected in the first round since Ron Dayne in 2000.
snippet: David Wilson, who is 5 feet 9 inches and 206 pounds, is the first running back the Giants have selected in the first round since Ron Dayne in 2000.
